title: No One Loved Me - Novel Updates
tags: European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Transmigration   Unrequited Love
author: No5
description:
I have committed an unforgivable sin. Even atonement for my sin seemed like a luxury for the rest of my life, and I was only alive because I was breathing......

Suddenly, I woke up in the body of another person. She is a woman who ingested poison six times in order to gain her husband's love.

Countess Cecilia Linton. Thanks to her diary, the contents of which looked liked her last will, I realized what I needed to do.

- I don't want to love my husband anymore...!

An absurd life that curses others just for their existence. I don't feel excited about starting a new life, but at the very least, the last wish of a woman who left her body to me should be granted.

'Cecilia, there will be no more tears for love in the future.'

No one loves me and neither do I for a long time. So as long as I became Cecilia, her wish must have been fulfilled.

My encounter with a man named Ricardo Bastian threw everything into confusion.>
